title: Real-time Location Tracking
description: The system shall provide real-time location tracking with sub-second updates

title: API Response Time
description: API response time shall be less than 100ms for 95th percentile

title: Multi-zone Support
description: System shall support multiple tracking zones with independent configurations

title: User Authentication
description: Users must authenticate via OAuth 2.0 or SAML

title: Data Export
description: System shall support data export in CSV and JSON formats
